name: geocache_multiple_choice
description: Get coordinates by answering multiple choice questions

env.description: Text that appears at the top of the page
env.value: Select the answers to the questions below to get the coordinates!

env.description: A unique Project Key created with the web.deta.sh interface.
A unique ID for THIS FORK ONLY, do not use an ID that you've used before, only use lower case and replace spaces with underscores

env.descripton: Final coordinates given after correct answers. MUST match Geocaching.com value EXACTLY (no extra spaces)
